The Million Dollar Question Last week, my colleague Sarah dropped by my desk with what seemed like a simple question: “How long do our customers typically stay with us?” As a data scientist at a SaaS company, I’ve learned that seemingly simple questions often lead to the most fascinating analyses. Beyond Simple Averages The traditional approach would be to calculate the average customer lifetime.
